product.name: Mortal Kombat 11
product.shortDescription: Raiden, absorbing all the negative energy induced by Shinnok into the Jinsei chamber...
product.description: MK is back and better than ever in the next evolution of the iconic franchise. Following the events of the previous game, Raiden, absorbing all the negative energy induced by Shinnok into the Jinsei chamber, has a personality change to a dark and radical one that seeks to get rid of Earthrrealm's enemies. Meanwhile, a mysterious enemy watches the events from the shadows.
